result.title: Maths Problem
result.content: Hello, I've been trying to solve this problem on POJ: http://poj.org/problem?id=2084 After few drawings I understood that i should calculate the catalan number of the given n, however I got a WA. I think its because the size of the numbers which exceed the long long unsigned limit. What should I do? Am i wrong or should I operate on strings instead and perform my own multiplication?
